title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 732.1 - Annual report required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 732.1 - Annual report required

State Regulations

Except as provided in this section, every electric, gas, steam and waterworks corporation and every municipality subject to the
commission's jurisdiction, is hereby directed and required to file annually
with this commission, at the time and for the period hereinafter provided, an
annual report on the form hereinafter prescribed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
732.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
